title: Silca Thinks the New Ultimate Sealant Is So Good It Pays Its Athletes $500 for Every Puncture
content:
Silca is so confident in its new carbon and latex-filled sealant that its putting money on the line.

Read the full article at Silca Thinks the New Ultimate Sealant Is So Good It Pays Its Athletes $500 for Every Puncture on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
